fields.description: Specifies whether password authentication should be disabled.
fields.name: DisablePasswordAuthentication

fields.description:
Indicates whether VMAgent Platform Updates is enabled for the Linux virtual
machine. Default value is false.
fields.name: EnableVMAgentPlatformUpdates

fields.description: [Preview Feature] Specifies settings related to VM Guest Patching on Linux.
fields.name: PatchSettings

fields.description:
Indicates whether virtual machine agent should be provisioned on the virtual
machine. When this property is not specified in the request body, default
behavior is to set it to true. This will ensure that VM Agent is installed on
the VM so that extensions can be added to the VM later.
fields.name: ProvisionVMAgent

fields.description: Specifies the ssh key configuration for a Linux OS.
fields.name: Ssh
